com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.objects

Class Sound

  • com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.objects.Sound

  • public class Sound

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • isListening

        public boolean isListening()

      • setListening

        public void setListening(boolean p)

      • onWorldLoad

        public void onWorldLoad()

      • setCategory

        @NotNull
public Sound setCategory(@NotNull
                                  java.lang.String category)

        Sets the category of this sound, making it respect the Player's sound volume sliders. Options are: master, music, record, weather, block, hostile, neutral, player, and ambient

        Parameters:
        category - the category

      • setVolume

        @NotNull
public Sound setVolume(float volume)

        Sets this sound's volume. Will override the category if called after setCategory, but not if called before.

        Parameters:
        volume - New volume, float value ( 0.0f - 1.0f ).
        See Also:
        setCategory

      • getVolume

        public float getVolume()

      • setPosition

        @NotNull
public Sound setPosition(float x,
                                  float y,
                                  float z)

        Updates the position of this sound

        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate

      • setPitch

        @NotNull
public Sound setPitch(float pitch)

        Sets this sound's pitch.

        Parameters:
        pitch - A float value ( 0.5f - 2.0f ).

      • getPitch

        public float getPitch()

      • setAttenuation

        @NotNull
public Sound setAttenuation(int model)

        Sets the attenuation (fade out over space) of the song. Models are: NONE(0) - no fade ROLLOFF(1) - this is the default, meant to be somewhat realistic LINEAR(2) - fades out linearly, as the name implies

        Parameters:
        model - the model

      • play

        public void play()

        Plays/resumes the sound

      • pause

        public void pause()

        Pauses the sound, to be resumed later

      • stop

        public void stop()

        Completely stops the song

      • rewind

        public void rewind()

        I really don't know what this does
